name: Sports Photography
description: Call JKP Sports today and get started on your upcoming races! As the world’s leading race photography platform, Pic2Go’s innovative platform automates technology.

name: Travel Photography
description: Pic2Go’s race photography technology is used by major events and sponsors in 40 countries. Pic2Go is also the developer of RunPage, the emerging Finishers Experience Platform.

name: Wedding Photography
description: Traditional photography captures events as they are supposed to. The beauty of candid wedding photography lies in the natural reactions of the people.
